attributes.action: Remove Julian Assange from the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Julian Assange, by cowering in the UK, is bringing the UK and its judicial system even further into disrepute. How is it that a British citizen can be dragged off to a foreign country without a second thought but this Australian is evading judicial process?

Irrespective of the ruling of the High Court, the Home Secretary must declare his presence in the UK not conducive to the public good and deport him.
